response.overview: Controversial New York filmmaker Brody Hawkins and his team launch a voyeuristic project aimed at using isolation and to push film subjects to their limit and face their inner demons, on camera. When tragedy strikes and the team begins to fray, examiners become the tested and their own ghosts begin to surface.
response.tagline: Do you have what it takes to face your inner demons?
response.title: 48 Hours in Purgatory
